regen.new_specification: The system shall allow users to delete selected data points from the visualization.

regen.absent_element: handling of multiple simultaneous clicks for revealing names of multiple data points
regen.new_specification: The system should display the names of all data points when multiple data points are simultaneously clicked.

regen.absent_element: warning or notification for exceeding the maximum limit of 2000 data points
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user when attempting to add more than 2000 data points.

label: The product should allow multiple points to be clicked so that multiple names can be displayed.
absence: action of clicking multiple points to display multiple names of the data points
